title: Response Schema for the campaigns mutate operation of GoogleAds
description: Schema representing the output of the campaigns mutate operation in GoogleAds API

partialFailureError.description: Errors that pertain to operation failures in the partial failure mode.

resourceName.description: The resource name of the criterion that was mutated.

campaign.description: The mutated campaign with only mutable fields after mutate.

resourceName.description: The resource name of the campaign criterion.

primaryStatus.description: The primary status of the campaign.

primaryStatusReasons.description: The primary status reasons of the campaign.

servingStatus.description: The serving status of the campaign.

biddingStrategySystemStatus.description: The system status of the bidding strategy.

adServingOptimizationStatus.description: The ad serving optimization status of the campaign.

advertisingChannelType.description: The advertising channel type of the campaign.

advertisingChannelSubType.description: The advertising channel subtype of the campaign.

urlCustomParameters.description: The URL custom parameters of the campaign.

labels.description: The labels attached to the campaign.

resourceName.description: The resource name of the label.

trackingUrlTemplate.description: The tracking URL template of the campaign.

baseCampaign.description: The base campaign of the campaign.

startDate.description: The start date of the campaign.

endDate.description: The end date of the campaign.

brandGuidelinesEnabled.description: Indicates whether brand guidelines are enabled for the campaign.

hotelPropertyAssetSet.description: The hotel property asset set associated with the campaign.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
